Statistician and Data Scientist with extensive experience managing multidisciplinary and strategic analytical projects. Expert in processing and analyzing large volumes of data to generate key insights for decision-making. Proven track record in diverse fields including mobility, culture, health, fintech, marketing, education, nutrition, environment, social development, Indigenous communities, financial technology, and public policy. Known for my capacity for self-learning, adaptability to new technologies, and strong results-oriented mindset. Proficient in statistical sampling, multivariate methods, and predictive modeling, with advanced command of Python, R, SQL, and cloud-based analytical environments.
